about_the_game:
Six Temples development is currently on hold, and the next update likely won't be until 2022. Stay tuned!

MULTIPLAYER MAYHEM

Six Temples is a team-based magic slasher featuring fantastic physics-driven weapon combat. With casual and competitive Online Matches, a fully-featured offline Custom Game mode, and various maps and modes featuring vast mythic landscapes and intimate arenas alike, there are countless hours of violent fun to be had sending your foes flying to the stratosphere.

MAGIC AND MELEE COMBAT

Form your own fighting style within the easy-to-use Directional Combat System, where every swing and spell lands with precision and power. Whether you choose a sword-wielding fighter, a mage, or an archer, every Hero comes equipped with multiple weapons, a Special Attack, and a devastating Ultimate Ability.
  • Charge enemy bases head on with offensive heroes like the powerful Barbarian or the nimble Count
  • Stop opponents in their tracks with the Wizard's devastating spells or the Hunter's precise arrows
  • Aid your team and ensure victory with support heroes like the indispensable Priestess or the spirit-warding Shaman

ONLINE OR OFFLINE

Face off in a 1v1 duel, brawl 6v6 until only one team is left standing, or join a larger 16v16 battle for territory. No Internet? Just want to take a break from Online multiplayer? Play the same maps and modes against challenging AI in fully-featured Custom Games.

content_descriptors.notes: Players engage in simulated battles with elements of stylized violence, including occasional stylized blood.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual-core Intel/AMD Processor 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel/AMD Processor 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 1070 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required

short_description: Carve through creatures of shadow, summon wicked spells, and reclaim relics in the Age of Apocalypse. Eternal glory is yours for the taking!
